verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:1
verses.text: I said in mine heart, Go to now, I will prove thee with mirth, therefore enjoy pleasure: and, behold, this also is vanity.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:2
verses.text: I said of laughter, It is mad: and of mirth, What doeth it?

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:3
verses.text: I sought in mine heart to give myself unto wine, yet acquainting mine heart with wisdom; and to lay hold on folly, till I might see what was that good for the sons of men, which they should do under the heaven all the days of their life.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:4
verses.text: I made me great works; I builded me houses; I planted me vineyards:
